h2_title: Where to Find the Yellow-Robed Squire
content: Finally, the Yellow-Robed Squire will return to near where you first met him, looking for a missing Gold Piece held by one of the Rat Princes. You can find this by defeating the First Prince of Flowing Sands in the Valley of Despair, and obtaning the Arhat Gold Piece from him. Return to Rockrest Flat, and the boar will fight you for the gold.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow-Robed_Squire.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow-Robed Squire', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Yellow-Robed Squire'.
The content is as follows:
Finally, the Yellow-Robed Squire will return to near where you first met him, looking for a missing Gold Piece held by one of the Rat Princes. You can find this by defeating the First Prince of Flowing Sands in the Valley of Despair, and obtaning the Arhat Gold Piece from him. Return to Rockrest Flat, and the boar will fight you for the gold.
